item.mysticedge.fire_katana.tooltip:
Forged in the flames of the Nether.
Flame Slash: Engulfs enemies in fire.
item.mysticedge.water_katana.tooltip:
Flowing like the deepest ocean currents.
Aqua Dash: Dash through water, striking foes.
item.mysticedge.wind_katana.tooltip:
Swift as the mountain gusts.
Gale Step: Leap forward with a burst of wind.
item.mysticedge.earth_katana.tooltip:
Solid as the mountains themselves.
Seismic Slam: Shake the ground, slowing enemies.
item.mysticedge.shadow_katana.tooltip:
Concealed in darkness, strikes unseen.
Phantom Step: Teleport behind your foe.
item.mysticedge.black_fire_katana.toolti:
Smoldering with Netherite fury.
Flame Slash: Engulfs enemies in fire.
item.mysticedge.black_water_katana.toolt:
The ocean's wrath condensed in steel.
Aqua Dash: Dash through water, striking foes.
item.mysticedge.black_wind_katana.toolti:
Sharper than a tempest's edge.
Gale Step: Leap forward with a burst of wind.
item.mysticedge.black_earth_katana.toolt:
Earth's strength, hardened further.
Seismic Slam: Shake the ground, slowing enemies.
item.mysticedge.black_shadow_katana.tool:
Shadows sharpened into a blade.
Phantom Step: Teleport behind your foe.
item.mysticedge.warden_fire_katana.toolt:
Burning with ancient Warden power.
Flame Slash: Engulfs enemies in fire + Darkness I.
item.mysticedge.warden_water_katana.tool:
Tides strengthened by Warden magic.
Aqua Dash: Dash through water, striking foes.
item.mysticedge.warden_wind_katana.toolt:
Warden winds, swift and deadly.
Gale Step: Leap forward with a burst of wind.
item.mysticedge.warden_earth_katana.tool:
The mountain's heart made Warden steel.
Seismic Slam: Shake the ground, slowing enemies.
item.mysticedge.warden_shadow_katana.too:
Darkness incarnate in Warden form.
Phantom Step: Teleport behind your foe.
item.mysticedge.aethernova_katana.toolti:
Fusion of all elemental blades.
Elemental Rift: Teleport and unleash all elemental forces.
Elemental fury tempered in Netherite.
Elemental Rift: Teleport and unleash all elemental forces.
item.mysticedge.warden_aethernova_katana:
The ultimate blade of legends.
Elemental Rift: Teleport and unleash all elemental forces.
